description:
Minor amendment  of planning permission ref P092306 dated 13 August 2010 for the Restoration of St. David's Church (Westbourne Road) including external and internal alterations to provide a total of 1455 square metres of community and worship space (Class D1), representing an overall increase of 612 square metres, in addition to a one bedroom residential unit, within the church building. The demolition of the church hall (Lough Road) and the erection of a seven storey building (plus basement), comprising 40 flats, and the construction of a separate two storey (plus basement) vicarage building comprising a four bedroom residential unit.  Associated landscaping and communal courtyard, accessed from Lough Road. the amendments are: 

-	At roof level, solar slate PV tiles are proposed instead of PV cells, the solar thermal panels are relocated to the rear of the property and an extract vent is added to aid ventilation.
-	Amendments to the roof lights on the lower roof slopes 
-	An entrance porch is added to the southern elevation.
-	Alterations to the fenestration at lower ground floor level of the southern elevation.
decision_conditions: The applicant is advised that only the changes identified in the proposal description are hereby agreed and that any additions and amendments beyond those which have been identified on the external works plan such as landscaping, bicycle and refuse storage will be agreed under separate approval of details applications.
